itunes:title: Philippians Week 2 with Jess Connolly
title: Philippians Week 2 with Jess Connolly
description:
It’s the second week of the SRT Philippians reading plan, and Raechel and Amanda are joined by Jess Connolly! Jess is a mama, author, church planter, podcast host, and the founder of All Good Things Collective and Go + Tell Gals. She was also there for the beginning of She Reads Truth, one of the first to commit to being a “woman in the Word of God every day.” 

Jess opens up about the shape that obedience to God has taken in her life and the comfort she has found in Scripture. As Paul tells us in Philippians, we can have peace, regardless of our circumstances, as long as we have Christ. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Philippians reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Philippians collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 15% on your first She Reads Truth Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/philippians-week-2/
